result.eng: We will have to examine the case again.
result.ga: Beidh orainn breathnú ar an chás arís
result.orig: Beidh orainn breathnú ar an chás arís
result.html: Beidh orainn breathnú ar an chás arísWe will have to examine the case again.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ orainn breaṫnú ar an ċás arísWe will have to examine the case again.

result.eng: He stayed a while looking at the old house.
result.ga: D'fhan sé tamall ag breathnú ar an seanteach
result.orig: D'fhan sé tamall ag breathnú ar an seanteach
result.html: D'fhan sé tamall ag breathnú ar an seanteachHe stayed a while looking at the old house.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟan sé tamall ag breaṫnú ar an seanteaċHe stayed a while looking at the old house.

result.ga: Tá sé go deas ag breathnú
result.orig: Tá sé go deas ag breathnú
result.html: Tá sé go deas ag breathnúIt's looking nice.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé go deas ag breaṫnúIt's looking nice.

result.eng: I love to watch cartoons on the television in the morning.
result.ga: Is breá liom breathnú ar chartúin ar maidin
result.orig: Is breá liom breathnú ar chartúin ar maidin
result.html: Is breá liom breathnú ar chartúin ar maidinI love to watch cartoons on the television in the morning.
result.ponchtml: Is breá liom breaṫnú ar ċartúin ar maidinI love to watch cartoons on the television in the morning.

result.eng: What about coming to my apartment and watching television?
result.ga: Céard faoi thíocht go dtí m'árasán agus a bheith ag breathnú ar an teilifís
result.orig: Céard faoi thíocht go dtí m'árasán agus a bheith ag breathnú ar an teilifís
result.html: Céard faoi thíocht go dtí m'árasán agus a bheith ag breathnú ar an teilifísWhat about coming to my apartment and watching television?
result.ponchtml: Céard faoi ṫíoċt go dtí m'árasán agus a ḃeiṫ ag breaṫnú ar an teilifísWhat about coming to my apartment and watching television?

result.eng: Would you like to watch 7 Lá?
result.ga: Ar mhaith leat breathnú ar 7 lá
result.orig: Ar mhaith leat breathnú ar 7 lá
result.html: Ar mhaith leat breathnú ar 7 láWould you like to watch 7 Lá?
result.ponchtml: Ar ṁaiṫ leat breaṫnú ar 7 láWould you like to watch 7 Lá?

result.eng: He was looking at the door as if the devil himself could come in any minute.
result.ga: Bhí sé ag breathnú ar an doras amhail is go bhféadfadh an t-áibhirseoir féin teacht isteach nóiméad ar bith
result.orig: Bhí sé ag breathnú ar an doras amhail is go bhféadfadh an t-áibhirseoir féin teacht isteach nóiméad ar bith
result.html: Bhí sé ag breathnú ar an doras amhail is go bhféadfadh an t-áibhirseoir féin teacht isteach nóiméad ar bithHe was looking at the door as if the devil himself could come in any minute.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé ag breaṫnú ar an doras aṁail is go ḃféadfaḋ an t-áiḃirseoir féin teaċt isteaċ nóiméad ar biṫHe was looking at the door as if the devil himself could come in any minute.

result.eng: While I was watching those live pictures [on TV], one thing was bothering me:...
result.ga: Agus mé ag breathnú ar na pictiúirí beo seo bhí rud amháin ag déanamh scime dom
result.orig: Agus mé ag breathnú ar na pictiúirí beo seo bhí rud amháin ag déanamh scime dom
result.html: Agus mé ag breathnú ar na pictiúirí beo seo bhí rud amháin ag déanamh scime domWhile I was watching those live pictures [on TV], one thing was bothering me:...
result.ponchtml: Agus mé ag breaṫnú ar na pictiúirí beo seo ḃí rud aṁáin ag déanaṁ scime domWhile I was watching those live pictures [on TV], one thing was bothering me:...

result.eng: It wasn't long before white people started looking at black people as a sub-race.
result.ga: Níorbh fhada gur thosaigh daoine geala ag breathnú ar dhaoine gorma mar fho-chine
result.orig: Níorbh fhada gur thosaigh daoine geala ag breathnú ar dhaoine gorma mar fho-chine
result.html: Níorbh fhada gur thosaigh daoine geala ag breathnú ar dhaoine gorma mar fho-chineIt wasn't long before white people started looking at black people as a sub-race.
result.ponchtml: Níorḃ ḟada gur ṫosaiġ daoine geala ag breaṫnú ar ḋaoine gorma mar ḟo-ċineIt wasn't long before white people started looking at black people as a sub-race.
